languages.text: Загадочный эльдарский механизм, превращенный в изысканное украшение. Будучи активированным, он непостижимым образом искажает пространственные и гравитационные параметры окружающей реальности, способствуя неизбежной гибели врагов своего хозяина. Каким образом богомерзкая машина отличает их от союзников владельца — не ведомо никому.

A mysterious Aeldari contraption fashioned into an exquisite decorative item. When activated, it uses inscrutable means to distort reality, altering the spatial and gravitational parameters of its surroundings in ways that cause the imminent death of its owner's enemies. Exactly how the unholy machine can tell them from its owner's allies remains beyond understanding.
languages.original_text: Загадочный эльдарский механизм, превращенный в изысканное украшение. Каким образом богомерзкая машина отличает их от союзников владельца — не ведомо никому.

A mysterious Aeldari contraption fashioned into an exquisite decorative item. When activated, it uses inscrutable means to distort reality, altering the spatial and gravitational parameters of its surroundings in ways that cause the imminent death of its owner's enemies. Exactly how the unholy machine can tell them from its owner's allies remains beyond understanding.

languages.text: Un misterioso dispositivo Aeldari convertido en exquisita decoración. Al activarlo, usa medios inescrutables para distorsionar la realidad, alterando los parámetros espaciales y gravitatorios de forma que los enemigos del portador sufran una muerte inminente. Nadie sabe cómo esta máquina sacrílega distingue a los enemigos del portador de sus enemigos.
languages.original_text: A mysterious Aeldari contraption fashioned into an exquisite decorative item. When activated, it uses inscrutable means to distort reality, altering the spatial and gravitational parameters of its surroundings in ways that cause the imminent death of its owner's enemies. Exactly how the unholy machine can tell them from its owner's allies remains beyond understanding.

traits.locale_text: Un misterioso dispositivo Aeldari convertido en exquisita decoración. Al activarlo, usa medios inescrutables para distorsionar la realidad, alterando los parámetros espaciales y gravitatorios de forma que los enemigos del portador sufran una muerte inminente. Nadie sabe cómo esta máquina sacrílega distingue a los enemigos del portador de sus enemigos.

languages.text: Un mystérieux dispositif aeldari ayant l'apparence d'un objet décoratif sophistiqué. Une fois activé, il emploie une technologie insondable pour déformer la réalité et altérer les propriétés spatiales et gravitationnelles dans son champ d'action, ce qui entraîne la mort presque immédiate des ennemis de son détenteur. Personne ne comprend vraiment comment cette machine impie parvient à distinguer ses alliés de ses agresseurs.
languages.original_text: A mysterious Aeldari contraption fashioned into an exquisite decorative item. When activated, it uses inscrutable means to distort reality, altering the spatial and gravitational parameters of its surroundings in ways that cause the imminent death of its owner's enemies. Exactly how the unholy machine can tell them from its owner's allies remains beyond understanding.

traits.locale_text: Un mystérieux dispositif aeldari ayant l'apparence d'un objet décoratif sophistiqué. Une fois activé, il emploie une technologie insondable pour déformer la réalité et altérer les propriétés spatiales et gravitationnelles dans son champ d'action, ce qui entraîne la mort presque immédiate des ennemis de son détenteur. Personne ne comprend vraiment comment cette machine impie parvient à distinguer ses alliés de ses agresseurs.

languages.text: 伪装成精美装饰品的艾达灵族神秘装置。一旦启动，它将以不可思议的力量扭曲现实，改变周围环境的空间和重力参数，瞬间杀死敌人。它是如何区分敌人与盟友的呢？我们至今无从知晓。
languages.original_text: A mysterious Aeldari contraption fashioned into an exquisite decorative item. When activated, it uses inscrutable means to distort reality, altering the spatial and gravitational parameters of its surroundings in ways that cause the imminent death of its owner's enemies. Exactly how the unholy machine can tell them from its owner's allies remains beyond understanding.

traits.locale_text: 伪装成精美装饰品的艾达灵族神秘装置。一旦启动，它将以不可思议的力量扭曲现实，改变周围环境的空间和重力参数，瞬间杀死敌人。它是如何区分敌人与盟友的呢？我们至今无从知晓。

languages.text: 神秘的なアエルダリの奇妙な機械装置であり、精巧な装飾品として身につけられる。起動すると、不可解な手段で現実を歪め、周囲の空間と重力のパラメータを変化させ、持ち主の敵を死に至らしめる。この不浄なる機械がどのようにして敵と味方を見分けるのか、その正確な方法はいまだ解明されていない。
languages.original_text: A mysterious Aeldari contraption fashioned into an exquisite decorative item. When activated, it uses inscrutable means to distort reality, altering the spatial and gravitational parameters of its surroundings in ways that cause the imminent death of its owner's enemies. Exactly how the unholy machine can tell them from its owner's allies remains beyond understanding.

traits.locale_text: 神秘的なアエルダリの奇妙な機械装置であり、精巧な装飾品として身につけられる。起動すると、不可解な手段で現実を歪め、周囲の空間と重力のパラメータを変化させ、持ち主の敵を死に至らしめる。この不浄なる機械がどのようにして敵と味方を見分けるのか、その正確な方法はいまだ解明されていない。

languages.text: Eine mysteriöse Aeldari-Vorrichtung, die zu einem exquisiten Dekorationsgegenstand verarbeitet wurde. Wenn das Gerät aktiviert wird, nutzt es unergründliche Mittel, um die Realität zu verzerren. Die Parameter von Raum und Schwerkraft in der Umgebung werden derart verändert, dass sämtliche Feinde unverzüglich sterben. Wie genau die unheilige Maschine Feinde von Verbündeten unterscheiden kann, ist nicht bekannt.
languages.original_text: A mysterious Aeldari contraption fashioned into an exquisite decorative item. When activated, it uses inscrutable means to distort reality, altering the spatial and gravitational parameters of its surroundings in ways that cause the imminent death of its owner's enemies. Exactly how the unholy machine can tell them from its owner's allies remains beyond understanding.

languages.text: Zarif bir süs eşyasına dönüştürülmüş gizemli bir Aeldari tertibatı. Etkinleştirildiğinde esrarengiz bir yolla gerçekliği çarpıtarak çevresinin uzamsal ve yerçekimsel parametrelerini, sahibinin düşmanlarının bir anda ölümüne neden olacak şekilde değiştirir. Şeytani makinenin, sahibinin düşmanlarını dostlarından nasıl ayırt edebildiği ise tam bir muammadır.
languages.original_text: A mysterious Aeldari contraption fashioned into an exquisite decorative item. When activated, it uses inscrutable means to distort reality, altering the spatial and gravitational parameters of its surroundings in ways that cause the imminent death of its owner's enemies. Exactly how the unholy machine can tell them from its owner's allies remains beyond understanding.
